block.p: Frances Yvonne Orteig, the daughter of Ann Buckles Orteig of Williamsburg, Va., and Raymond E. Orteig III of New York, was married yesterday to Jack Edward Fielden Jr., the son of Billie Lu Fielden and Dr. Fielden of San Antonio. The Rev. Lyndon F. Harris performed the ceremony at Grace Episcopal Church in New York.

The bride, 30, is known as Yvonne. She graduated from Barnard College and is studying for a master's degree in social work at New York University. Her father is a stockbroker with the Marquette de Bary Company, a brokerage firm in New York. Her mother is a former Broadway and television actress.

The bridegroom, 30, is known as Jay. He is the arts editor of Vogue magazine in New York. Until last month, he was an associate editor at The New Yorker magazine. He graduated from Boston University. His mother is the owner and head instructor of the San Antonio School of Classic Ballet. His father is a retired endodontist.

The bridegroom, 30, is known as Jay. He is the arts editor of Vogue magazine in New York. Until last month, he was an associate editor at The New Yorker magazine. He graduated from Boston University. His mother is the owner and head instructor of the San Antonio School of Classic Ballet. His father is a retired endodontist.
